Syntax
[ContentProperty("ContentView")]
public abstract class PopupBase : Layout<View>, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDynamicResourceHandler, IElement, INameScope, IAnimatable, IResourcesProvider, IViewController, IVisualElementController, IElementController, ILayout, ILayoutController, IViewContainer<View>, IDisposable, IPopup, IBackground, IShape, IElement
